{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Electric shock","existingMeasures":"1. Work plan & Toolbox meeting to be conducted prior to commencement of task.
2. Electrical isolation and LOTO to be in place.
3. Insulation mat to be placed below the starter panel.
4. Appropriate PPE to be worn when performing the task.
5. Work area to be kept clear of hazardous substances.
6. Unauthorized entry prohibited.
7. Check tools condition before using.","additionalMeasures":"1. Ensure electrical equipment fuses are removed to dead the equipment prior to commencing the task.
2. Verify that the circuit are dead on the electrical equipment prior to commencing the task.
3. Ensure all meters and tools are tested and in good condition.","likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":1,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":4},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Improper commissioning or poor post maintenance performance","existingMeasures":"1. Use correct PPE as per PPE matrix.
2. Post Maintenance has to be check by competent person.
3. Supervision by person in charge.
4. First Aid on standby.
5. Proper communication established.
6. Clearly designates roles and responsibilities.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":2,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":1,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Adverse weather condition","existingMeasures":"1. Use correct PPE as per PPE matrix.
2. Toolbox meeting to be carried out.
3. Always carry portable gas meter.
4. To standby additional personnel.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":2,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":1,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Damage to equipment","existingMeasures":"1. Toolbox meeting to be carried out.
2. Ensure all involve personnel are clear about their individual task.

Task to be carried out according to the plan.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"OHSAS - Ergonomic hazards - Back pain","existingMeasures":"1. Personnel involved should get proper rest.
2. Don't work in same position continuously.
3. Take break in between.
4. Change people if necessary.
5. No short cut method is allowed.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Obstruction in work area","existingMeasures":"1. Toolbox meeting to be carried out & to discuss work plan.
2. Use correct PPE as per PPE matrix.
3. Working area should be dry and clean at all times.
4. Tools should be properly arranged in work area.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null}],"methodDescription":"Standard Procedure for maintenance of Electrical equipment"}
